doc.name: RefinementExtender
doc.description: An attribute to add a class to the list of refinement classes for a state. The name of this attribute should be an easy-to-remember name of the refinement class to be shown to the user in the dialog displayed when the user chooses to add a refinement. The className property of this attribute refers to the actual class, which is either a Java class with which the refinement is to be created, or a Ptolemy class specified in MoML at the path pointed to by the class name.
doc.author: Thomas Huining Feng
doc.property: The full name of the refinement class.
A string description of the refinement class, which is shown in the dialog for the user to choose a refinement to add.
